trans-unit.source: Manages user membership in roles for authorization checking in an ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: 管理角色中的使用者成員資格，以在 ASP.NET 應用程式中執行授權檢查。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET role management enables you to manage authorization for your application based on groups of users, referred to as roles.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 角色管理可讓您管理您的應用程式使用者群組，稱為角色為基礎的授權。

trans-unit.source: By assigning users to roles, you can control access to different parts or features of your Web application based on role instead of, or in addition to, specifying authorization based on user name.
trans-unit.target: 將使用者指派至角色，您可以控制存取不同的組件或根據角色而不是或，Web 應用程式的功能來指定使用者名稱為基礎的授權。

trans-unit.source: For example, an employee application might have roles such as Managers, Employees, Directors, and so on, where different privileges are specified for each role.
trans-unit.target: 例如，員工應用程式可能有角色，例如經理、 員工、 導演，依此類推，其中每個角色指定不同的權限。

trans-unit.source: Users can belong to more than one role.
trans-unit.target: 使用者可以屬於多個角色。

trans-unit.source: For example, if your site is a discussion forum, some users might be in the role of both Members and Moderators.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您的網站是討論論壇，某些使用者可能角色的成員和仲裁。

trans-unit.source: You might define each role to have different privileges on the site, and a user who is in both roles would then have both sets of privileges.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在網站上，有不同權限的每個角色定義，而這兩種角色的使用者會擁有兩組權限。

trans-unit.source: To enable role management for your ASP.NET application, use the element of the `system.web` section in the Web.config file for your application, as shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: 若要啟用角色管理 ASP.NET 應用程式，使用的項目`system.web`主題應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中，如下列範例所示。

trans-unit.source: You can specify authorization rules in the configuration file for your Web application or programmatically in your code.
trans-unit.target: Web 應用程式組態檔中或以程式設計方式在程式碼中，您可以指定授權規則。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following section from a Web.config file requires users to log on (by denying anonymous users), and then allows only users in the Administrators role to have access.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，Web.config 檔案中的下列區段需要使用者登入 （透過拒絕匿名使用者），，然後只允許使用者具有存取權的系統管理員角色中。

trans-unit.source: If you use the `authorization` section in your application's Web.config file to specify authorization based on roles, users of your application must supply an authenticated user identity.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用`authorization`區段來指定角色，應用程式的使用者為基礎的授權應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中必須提供已驗證的使用者身分識別。

trans-unit.source: You can authenticate users by using either Windows or Forms authentication.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 Windows 或表單驗證來驗證使用者。

trans-unit.source: Anonymous users cannot be assigned to a role.
trans-unit.target: 匿名使用者不能指派給角色。

trans-unit.source: Roles can be used independently of, or in conjunction with, the ASP.NET <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership> classes.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用角色，獨立的或與 ASP.NET 搭配<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership>類別。

trans-unit.source: To verify role membership programmatically, you can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles> class or the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.User%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property with the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.IsUserInRole%2A> method, or you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.User%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property with the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要以程式設計的方式確認角色成員資格，您可以使用<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles>類別或<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.User%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.IsUserInRole%2A>方法，或者您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.User%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: For sample code that programmatically checks role membership, see the Example section in this topic.
trans-unit.target: 以程式設計方式檢查角色成員資格的範例程式碼，請參閱本主題中的範例 > 一節。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles> class also enables you to create and delete roles and to add users to or remove users from roles.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles>類別也可讓您建立和刪除角色並將使用者加入或從角色移除使用者。

trans-unit.source: If you have configured your application to use the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider> class, you cannot modify roles or role membership.
trans-unit.target: 如果您已設定應用程式使用<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider>類別，您無法修改角色或角色成員資格。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider> classverifies membership in Windows security groups only.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider>單獨 classverifies Windows 安全性中的成員資格群組。

trans-unit.source: In this case, you must use Windows user account management rather than ASP.NET roles to create and delete groups and manage group membership.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，您必須使用 Windows 使用者帳戶管理，而不是 ASP.NET 角色來建立和刪除群組及管理群組成員資格。

trans-unit.source: You can store role information in several data sources.
trans-unit.target: 您可以儲存角色資訊在數個資料來源。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider> class to retrieve role information based on membership in Windows groups.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider>擷取角色資訊的類別，根據 Windows 群組的成員資格。

trans-unit.source: You can store role information in a SQL Server database by using the <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider> class.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用 SQL Server 資料庫中儲存角色資訊<xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider>類別。

trans-unit.source: If you have existing role information, or want to store role information in and retrieve role information from a data source other than Windows, an Authorization Store, or SQL Server, you can implement a custom role provider by creating a class that inherits the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider> abstract class.
trans-unit.target: 如果您有現有的角色資訊，或想要儲存中的角色資訊及擷取角色資訊從 Windows、 授權存放區或 SQL Server 以外的資料來源，您可以藉由建立繼承實作自訂角色提供者<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider>抽象類別。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Implementing a Role Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/851671ce-bf9b-43f2-aba4-bc9d28b11c7d).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[實作角色提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/851671ce-bf9b-43f2-aba4-bc9d28b11c7d)。

trans-unit.source: If a user's browser accepts cookies, you can store role information for that user in a cookie on the user's computer.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者的瀏覽器接受 cookie，您可以在使用者的電腦上的 cookie 中儲存該使用者的角色資訊。

trans-unit.source: On each page request, ASP.NET reads the role information for that user from the cookie.
trans-unit.target: 每個頁面要求時，ASP.NET 會讀取該使用者的角色資訊 cookie 中。

trans-unit.source: This can improve application performance by reducing the amount of communication required with the data source to retrieve role information.
trans-unit.target: 這可以改善應用程式效能降低的通訊所需要的資料來源擷取角色資訊。

trans-unit.source: If the role information for a user is too long to store in a cookie, ASP.NET stores just the most recently used role information in the cookie and then looks up additional role information in the data source as required.
trans-unit.target: 如果太長，無法在 cookie 中儲存使用者的角色資訊，ASP.NET 就只是最近使用的角色資訊儲存在 cookie 中，並接著會尋找所需的資料來源中的其他角色資訊。

trans-unit.source: If the user's browser does not support cookies or cookies are disabled, role information is not cached in a cookie.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者的瀏覽器不支援 cookie，或已停用 cookie，角色資訊不會快取 cookie。

trans-unit.source: You can improve the reliability of the role names cached in a cookie by specifying a <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieProtectionValue%2A> property when you configure ASP.NET roles.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由指定在 cookie 中快取的角色名稱的可靠性來改善<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieProtectionValue%2A>屬性，當您設定 ASP.NET 角色。

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieProtectionValue%2A> is `All`, which encrypts role names in the cookie and validates that the cookie contents have not been altered.
trans-unit.target: 預設值<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieProtectionValue%2A>是`All`，它會加密在 cookie 中的角色名稱，並驗證尚未改變的 cookie 內容。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the Web.config file for an application configured to use both ASP.NET membership and ASP.NET roles and to use the <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider> to store membership and role information in a SQL Server database.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範設定為使用 ASP.NET 成員資格和 ASP.NET 角色且使用的應用程式的 Web.config 檔案<xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider>成員資格和角色的資訊儲存在 SQL Server 資料庫。

trans-unit.source: Users are authenticated with forms authentication and only users in the Administrators role are allowed access to the application.
trans-unit.target: 只有系統管理員角色的使用者，才允許存取應用程式和與表單驗證來驗證使用者。

trans-unit.source: The following code example programmatically checks whether the logged-on user is in the Administrators role before allowing the user to view other users' roles.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例以程式設計方式檢查登入的使用者是否在系統管理員角色中，然後才允許使用者檢視其他使用者的角色。

trans-unit.source: A string array of user names to add to the specified role.
trans-unit.target: 要加入指定角色之使用者名稱的字串陣列。

trans-unit.source: The role to add the specified user names to.
trans-unit.target: 要加入指定使用者名稱的角色。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified users to the specified role.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的使用者加入指定的角色。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.AddUsersToRole%2A> method calls the default role provider to associate the specified users with the specified role at the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.AddUsersToRole%2A>方法會呼叫預設角色提供者指定的使用者與資料來源指定的角色建立關聯。

trans-unit.source: If your application uses the <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider> class, the database updates that are performed during the call to the <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider.AddUsersToRoles%2A> method are made within a transaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的應用程式使用<xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider>類別，會在呼叫期間執行資料庫更新<xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider.AddUsersToRoles%2A>方法在交易內進行。

trans-unit.source: If an error is encountered, such as a user name that is already in a specified role, the transaction is rolled back and no updates are performed.
trans-unit.target: 如果發生錯誤，例如使用者名稱已在指定的角色，會回復交易，會執行任何更新。

trans-unit.source: User names and role names cannot contain commas.
trans-unit.target: 使用者名稱和角色名稱不能包含逗號。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the application to store and retrieve role information for.

trans-unit.source: The name of the application to store and retrieve role information for.
trans-unit.target: 要儲存和擷取角色資訊的應用程式名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.ApplicationName%2A> property is used by the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles> class to associate users and roles with different applications.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.ApplicationName%2A>屬性供<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles>與不同的應用程式的使用者和角色的類別。

trans-unit.source: This enables multiple applications to use the same data source to store user and role information without running into conflicts between duplicate user names or duplicate role names.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓多個應用程式使用相同的資料來源來儲存使用者和角色資訊而不重複的使用者名稱或重複的角色名稱之間發生衝突。

trans-unit.source: Multiple ASP.NET applications can use the same data source by specifying the same value in the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.ApplicationName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 多個 ASP.NET 應用程式可以使用相同的資料來源，藉由指定相同值的<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.ApplicationName%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can set the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.ApplicationName%2A> property programmatically, or you can set it declaratively in the configuration file for the Web application by using the `applicationName` attribute.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.ApplicationName%2A>屬性以程式設計的方式，或者您可以設定它以宣告方式在 Web 應用程式的組態檔中使用`applicationName`屬性。

trans-unit.source: If your Web application is using the <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider> class and a value is not specified for the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file, the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.ApplicationPath%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property value for the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Web 應用程式使用<xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider>如未指定類別和實值`applicationName`組態檔中的屬性<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.ApplicationPath%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>目前屬性值<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性使用。

trans-unit.source: Because a single default role provider instance is used for all of the requests served by an <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication> object, you can have multiple requests executing concurrently and attempting to set the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.ApplicationName%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 因為所有由提供服務的要求會使用單一預設角色提供者執行個體<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication>物件，您可以有多個要求同時執行，而且嘗試設定<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.ApplicationName%2A>屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.ApplicationName%2A> property is not thread safe for multiple writes, and changing the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.ApplicationName%2A> property value can result in unexpected behavior for multiple users of an application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.ApplicationName%2A>屬性不是執行緒安全的多個寫入，且變更<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.ApplicationName%2A>屬性值可能會導致非預期的行為，應用程式的多個使用者。

trans-unit.source: You should avoid writing code to allow users to set the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.ApplicationName%2A> property, unless required.
trans-unit.target: 您應該避免撰寫程式碼，以讓使用者能夠設定<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.ApplicationName%2A>屬性，除非必要否則。

trans-unit.source: An example of an application where setting the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.ApplicationName%2A> property may be required is an administrative application that manages role data for multiple applications.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式的範例設定<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.ApplicationName%2A>屬性可能需要為系統管理的應用程式管理角色的多個應用程式的資料。

trans-unit.source: Such an application should be a single-user application and not a Web application.
trans-unit.target: 這類應用程式應該在單一使用者應用程式並不是 Web 應用程式。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範中的項目`system.web`的 ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案區段。

trans-unit.source: It specifies that the application uses a <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider> instance and sets the `applicationName` attribute to `MyApplication`.
trans-unit.target: 它會指定應用程式使用<xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider>執行個體和設定`applicationName`屬性`MyApplication`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current user's roles are cached in a cookie.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出目前使用者的角色是否在 Cookie 中快取。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current user's roles are cached in a cookie; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前使用者的角色在 Cookie 中快取，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CacheRolesInCookie%2A> property is set to `true` in the Web.config file, role information for each user is stored in a cookie.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CacheRolesInCookie%2A>屬性設定為`true`在 Web.config 檔案中，每個使用者角色資訊儲存在 cookie 中。

trans-unit.source: When role management checks to see whether a user is in a particular role, the roles cookie is checked before the role provider is called to check the list of roles at the data source.
trans-unit.target: 當角色管理檢查使用者為特定角色時，角色提供者會檢查資料來源的角色清單在呼叫之前，會檢查角色 cookie。

trans-unit.source: The cookie is dynamically updated to cache the most recently validated role names.
trans-unit.target: Cookie 會動態更新快取最近驗證過的角色名稱。

trans-unit.source: You can improve the reliability of the role names cached in a cookie by specifying a <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieProtectionValue%2A> property when you configure ASP.NET roles.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由指定在 cookie 中快取的角色名稱的可靠性來改善<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieProtectionValue%2A>屬性，當您設定 ASP.NET 角色。

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieProtectionValue%2A> is `All`, which encrypts role names in the cookie and validates that the cookie contents have not been altered.
trans-unit.target: 預設值<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieProtectionValue%2A>是`All`，它會加密在 cookie 中的角色名稱，並驗證尚未改變的 cookie 內容。

trans-unit.source: Because role names can be cached apart from the data source, it is possible that changes to role management at the data source would not be reflected in the cached values.
trans-unit.target: 因為除了資料來源，可以在快取角色名稱，很可能在資料來源的角色管理變更不會反映在快取值。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the user must close and re-open their browser to clear the cached cookie value.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，使用者必須關閉再重新開啟瀏覽器清除快取的 cookie 值。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範中的項目`system.web`的 ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案區段。

trans-unit.source: It specifies that the application uses a <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider> instance and sets the `cacheRolesInCookie` attribute to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 它會指定應用程式使用<xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider>執行個體和設定`cacheRolesInCookie`屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the cookie where role names are cached.
trans-unit.target: 取得快取角色名稱之 Cookie 的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the cookie where role names are cached.
trans-unit.target: 快取角色名稱之 Cookie 的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The default is .ASPXROLES.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 .ASPXROLES。

trans-unit.source: You can specify the name of the cookie where roles are cached for your application by setting the `cookieName` attribute in the Web.config file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以設定您的應用程式指定的角色是否快取的 cookie 名稱`cookieName`ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you want to uniquely identify a cookie for your application or when a cookie is shared across multiple applications, such as a domain cookie.
trans-unit.target: 當您想要唯一識別您的應用程式的 cookie 或 cookie 橫跨多個應用程式，例如網域 cookie，這非常有用。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範中的項目`system.web`的 ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案區段。

trans-unit.source: It specifies that the application uses a <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider> instance and sets the `cookieName` attribute to .ASPROLES.
trans-unit.target: 它會指定應用程式使用<xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider>執行個體和設定`cookieName`屬性。ASPROLES。

trans-unit.source: Gets the path for the cached role names cookie.
trans-unit.target: 取得快取角色名稱 Cookie 的路徑。

trans-unit.source: The path of the cookie where role names are cached.
trans-unit.target: 快取角色名稱之 Cookie 的路徑。

trans-unit.source: The default is /.
trans-unit.target: 預設為 /。

trans-unit.source: You can specify the path of the cookie where roles are cached for your application by setting the `cookiePath` attribute in the Web.config file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以設定您的應用程式指定的角色是否快取的 cookie 路徑`cookiePath`ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information on cookie paths, see <xref:System.Web.HttpCookie.Path%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 cookie 路徑的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.HttpCookie.Path%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範中的項目`system.web`的 ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案區段。

trans-unit.source: It specifies that the application uses a <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider> instance and sets the `cookiePath` attribute to /MyApplication.
trans-unit.target: 它會指定應用程式使用<xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider>執行個體和設定`cookiePath`/MyApplication 此屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates how role names cached in a cookie are protected.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示如何保護在 Cookie 中快取的角色名稱。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.CookieProtection" /> enumeration values indicating how role names that are cached in a cookie are protected.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.CookieProtection" /> 列舉值，表示如何保護在 Cookie 中快取的角色名稱。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="All" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="All" />。

trans-unit.source: You can specify the protection of the cookie where roles are cached for your application by setting the `cookieProtection` attribute in the Web.config file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以設定您的應用程式指定的角色是否快取的 cookie 保護`cookieProtection`ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The `cookieProtection` attribute takes a <xref:System.Web.Security.CookieProtection> enumeration value that indicates whether the role names are encrypted, validated, both, or neither.
trans-unit.target: `cookieProtection`屬性會採用<xref:System.Web.Security.CookieProtection>列舉值，指出是否會加密角色名稱、 驗證，兩者，或兩者皆非。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範中的項目`system.web`的 ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案區段。

trans-unit.source: It specifies that the application uses a <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider> instance and sets `cookieProtection` attribute to `Encrypted`.
trans-unit.target: 它會指定應用程式使用<xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider>執行個體和設定`cookieProtection`屬性`Encrypted`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the role names cookie requires SSL in order to be returned to the server.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出角色名稱 Cookie 是否需要 SSL 才能傳回至伺服器。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if SSL is required to return the role names cookie to the server; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果將角色名稱 Cookie 傳回至伺服器時需要 SSL，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: You can specify whether SSL (Secure Sockets Layer) is required to return the role names cookie to the server in your application by setting the `cookieRequireSSL` attribute in the Web.config file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由設定傳回至您的應用程式中的伺服器的角色名稱 cookie 是否需要 SSL （安全通訊端層） 來指定`cookieRequireSSL`ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.HttpCookie.Secure%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.HttpCookie.Secure%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範中的項目`system.web`的 ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案區段。

trans-unit.source: It specifies that the application uses a <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider> instance and sets `cookieRequireSSL` to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 它會指定應用程式使用<xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider>執行個體和設定`cookieRequireSSL`至`true`。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the role names cookie expiration date and time will be reset periodically.
trans-unit.target: 指出是否定期重設角色名稱 Cookie 的到期日和時間。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the role names cookie expiration date and time will be reset periodically; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要定期重設角色名稱 Cookie 的到期日和時間，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: You can specify whether role names cookie expiration date and time will be reset with each response by using the `cookieSlidingExpiration` attribute in the Web.config file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定是否角色名稱 cookie 的到期日和時間將會重設與每個回應使用`cookieSlidingExpiration`ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If `true`, the cookie expiration will initially be set to the current date and time plus the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieTimeout%2A> in minutes.
trans-unit.target: 如果`true`，cookie 到期日一開始會設定為目前的日期和時間加上<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieTimeout%2A>以分鐘為單位。

trans-unit.source: While the user continues to actively use the ASP.NET application, the expiration date and time of the cookie will be automatically refreshed if there is less than half of the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieTimeout%2A> remaining.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者繼續主動使用 ASP.NET 應用程式時的到期日期和時間的 cookie 會自動重新整理如果沒有不超過一半的<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieTimeout%2A>剩餘。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.HttpCookie.Expires%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Web.HttpCookie.Expires%2A> 屬性 (Property)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範中的項目`system.web`的 ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案區段。

trans-unit.source: It specifies that the application uses a <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider> instance and sets the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieSlidingExpiration%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 它會指定應用程式使用<xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider>執行個體和設定<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieSlidingExpiration%2A>屬性`false`。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of minutes before the roles cookie expires.
trans-unit.target: 取得角色 Cookie 過期前的分鐘數。

trans-unit.source: An integer specifying the number of minutes before the roles cookie expires.
trans-unit.target: 指定角色 Cookie 過期前分鐘數的整數。

trans-unit.source: The default is 30 minutes.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 30 分鐘。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieTimeout%2A> property is used when the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieSlidingExpiration%2A> property is `true` and specifies the time-to-live in minutes for the roles cookie.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieTimeout%2A>屬性使用時<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieSlidingExpiration%2A>屬性是`true`和指定分鐘角色 cookie 的存留時間。

trans-unit.source: To set the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieTimeout%2A> value, add the `cookieTimeout` attribute to the element in the Web.config file for the ASP.NET application and specify an integer value.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieTimeout%2A>值，請新增`cookieTimeout`ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中的項目屬性，指定一個整數值。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieSlidingExpiration%2A> is `false`, this property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieSlidingExpiration%2A>是`false`，會忽略這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範中的項目`system.web`的 ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案區段。

trans-unit.source: It specifies that the application uses a <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider> instance and sets the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieTimeout%2A> property to 30 minutes.
trans-unit.target: 它會指定應用程式使用<xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider>執行個體和設定<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieTimeout%2A>30 分鐘內的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the role-names cookie is session-based or persistent.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出角色名稱 Cookie 是否以工作階段為基礎，或為永續性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the role-names cookie is a persistent cookie; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果角色名稱 Cookie 是永續性 Cookie，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CreatePersistentCookie%2A> property value is set in the configuration for an ASP.NET application using the `createPersistentCookie` attribute of the configuration element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CreatePersistentCookie%2A>屬性值會設定 ASP.NET 應用程式使用的組態中`createPersistentCookie`組態項目的屬性。

trans-unit.source: When `false`, the role-names cookie is a session cookie, that is, the cookie is lost when the browser is closed.
trans-unit.target: 當`false`角色名稱 cookie、 工作階段 cookie，亦即，cookie 遺失關閉時，會在瀏覽器。

trans-unit.source: When `true`, the role-names cookie is a persistent cookie that is available across multiple browser sessions.
trans-unit.target: 當`true`，角色名稱 cookie 是永續性 cookie 可跨多個瀏覽器工作階段。

trans-unit.source: The persistent cookie expiration date and time are set to the current date and time plus the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieTimeout%2A> value in minutes.
trans-unit.target: 永續性 cookie 到期日和時間設定為目前的日期和時間加上<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieTimeout%2A>以分鐘為單位的值。

trans-unit.source: The name of the role to create.
trans-unit.target: 要建立的角色名稱。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new role to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 將新角色加入資料來源。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CreateRole%2A> method adds a role name to the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CreateRole%2A>方法會將角色名稱加入至資料來源。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CreateRole%2A> calls the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider.CreateRole%2A> method of the default role provider to add the specified role to the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CreateRole%2A> 呼叫<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider.CreateRole%2A>方法加入至資料來源的指定的角色的預設角色提供者。

trans-unit.source: Role names cannot contain commas.
trans-unit.target: 角色名稱不能包含逗號。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a new role in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立新的角色中的資料來源。

trans-unit.source: For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles>.
trans-unit.target: 如需可讓您管理角色的 Web.config 檔案的範例，請參閱<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles>。

trans-unit.source: This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例包含一個文字方塊，可接受使用者輸入，可能會造成安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.DeleteCookie%2A> method clears the contents of the cookie that is used to cache role names.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.DeleteCookie%2A>方法清除用來快取角色名稱 cookie 的內容。

trans-unit.source: For more information on caching role names, see <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CacheRolesInCookie%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關快取角色名稱的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CacheRolesInCookie%2A>。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會呼叫<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.DeleteCookie%2A>時在使用者登入方法，以清除任何快取角色名稱。

trans-unit.source: Role management is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: 未啟用角色管理。

trans-unit.source: Removes a role from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 從資料來源中移除角色。

trans-unit.source: The name of the role to delete.
trans-unit.target: 要刪除的角色名稱。

trans-unit.source: Removes a role from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 從資料來源中移除角色。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="roleName" /> was deleted from the data source; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="roleName" /> 已從資料來源中刪除，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.DeleteRole%2A> method removes a role name from the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.DeleteRole%2A>方法會移除資料來源中的角色名稱。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.DeleteRole%2A> calls the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider.DeleteRole%2A> method of the default role provider to remove the specified role from the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.DeleteRole%2A> 呼叫<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider.DeleteRole%2A>方法的預設角色提供者，從資料來源中移除指定的角色。

trans-unit.source: If the role identified by the `roleName` parameter has one or more members, then an exception will be thrown and the role will not be deleted.
trans-unit.target: 如果角色由`roleName`參數有一個或多個成員，則會擲回例外狀況和角色將不會刪除。

trans-unit.source: The following code example deletes a role from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會刪除資料來源的角色。

trans-unit.source: For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles>.
trans-unit.target: 如需可讓您管理角色的 Web.config 檔案的範例，請參閱<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="roleName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="roleName" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="roleName" /> is an empty string or contains a comma (,).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="roleName" /> 是空字串，或包含逗號 (,)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="roleName" /> has one or more members.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="roleName" /> 具有一或多個成員。

trans-unit.source: -or-
Role management is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: 未啟用角色管理。

trans-unit.source: The name of the role to delete.
trans-unit.target: 要刪除的角色名稱。

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="true" />, throws an exception if <c>roleName</c> has one or more members.
trans-unit.target: 如果為 <see langword="true" />，就會在 <c>roleName</c> 有一或多個成員時，擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Removes a role from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 從資料來源中移除角色。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="roleName" /> was deleted from the data source; otherwise; <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="roleName" /> 已從資料來源中刪除，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.DeleteRole%2A> method removes a role name from the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.DeleteRole%2A>方法會移除資料來源中的角色名稱。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.DeleteRole%2A> calls the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider.DeleteRole%2A> method of the default role provider to remove the specified role from the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.DeleteRole%2A> 呼叫<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider.DeleteRole%2A>方法的預設角色提供者，從資料來源中移除指定的角色。

trans-unit.source: If `throwOnPopulatedRole` is `true`, then an exception will be thrown and the role will not be deleted if the role identified by the `roleName` parameter has one or more members.
trans-unit.target: 如果`throwOnPopulatedRole`是`true`則會擲回例外狀況，角色將不會刪除，如果角色由`roleName`參數有一個或多個成員。

trans-unit.source: If `throwOnPopulatedRole` is `false`, then the role will be deleted whether it is empty or not.
trans-unit.target: 如果`throwOnPopulatedRole`是`false`，則它是空的或不會刪除該角色。

trans-unit.source: The following code example deletes a role from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會刪除資料來源的角色。

trans-unit.source: For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles>.
trans-unit.target: 如需可讓您管理角色的 Web.config 檔案的範例，請參閱<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="roleName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="roleName" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="roleName" /> is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="roleName" /> 為空字串。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="roleName" /> has one or more members and <paramref name="throwOnPopulatedRole" /> is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="roleName" /> 具有一或多個成員，且 <paramref name="throwOnPopulatedRole" /> 是 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
Role management is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: 未啟用角色管理。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the domain of the role-names cookie.
trans-unit.target: 取得角色名稱 Cookie 的網域值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpCookie.Domain" /> of the role names cookie.
trans-unit.target: 角色名稱 Cookie 的 <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpCookie.Domain" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Domain%2A> property value is set in the configuration for an ASP.NET application using the `domain` attribute of the configuration element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Domain%2A>屬性值會設定 ASP.NET 應用程式使用的組態中`domain`組態項目的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If no value is specified in the configuration for the domain attribute, the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Domain%2A> property returns `null` and the role-names cookie domain defaults to the behavior of the <xref:System.Web.HttpCookie><xref:System.Web.HttpCookie.Domain%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果未不指定任何值，在針對網域屬性，設定<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Domain%2A>屬性會傳回`null`及行為的預設值的角色名稱 cookie 網域<xref:System.Web.HttpCookie><xref:System.Web.HttpCookie.Domain%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether role management is enabled for the current Web application.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否已啟用目前 Web 應用程式的角色管理。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if role management is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已啟用角色管理，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範中的項目`system.web`的 ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案區段。

trans-unit.source: It specifies that the application uses a <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider> instance and sets the `enabled` attribute to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 它會指定應用程式使用<xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider>執行個體和設定`enabled`屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: The role to search in.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的角色。

trans-unit.source: The user name to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of users in a specified role where the user name contains the specified user name to match.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定角色中的使用者清單，其中使用者名稱包含要符合的指定使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: A string array containing the names of all the users whose user name matches <paramref name="usernameToMatch" /> and who are members of the specified role.
trans-unit.target: 字串陣列，包含所有使用者的名稱，這些使用者的使用者名稱符合 <paramref name="usernameToMatch" />，而且是指定角色的成員。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.FindUsersInRole%2A> returns a list of users in a role where the user name contains a match of the supplied `usernameToMatch` for the configured `applicationName`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.FindUsersInRole%2A> 傳回角色中的使用者清單，其中使用者名稱包含相符項目所提供`usernameToMatch`設定`applicationName`。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the `usernameToMatch` parameter is set to "user," then the users "user1," "user2," "user3," and so on are returned.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果`usernameToMatch`參數設定為 「 使用者 」，則"user1"、"user2"、"user3，「 使用者，而且會傳回等等。

trans-unit.source: Users are returned in alphabetical order by user name.
trans-unit.target: 依使用者名稱以字母順序傳回使用者。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider> performs its search using a LIKE clause against the `usernameToMatch` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider>執行使用 LIKE 子句針對其搜尋`usernameToMatch`參數。

trans-unit.source: Any wildcards that are supported by SQL Server in LIKE clauses can be used in the `usernameToMatch` parameter value.
trans-unit.target: LIKE 子句可用於中的 SQL Server 所支援任何萬用字元`usernameToMatch`參數值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.FindUsersInRole%2A> method to display role membership based on user input.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.FindUsersInRole%2A>根據使用者輸入的方法，以顯示角色成員資格。

trans-unit.target: 未啟用角色管理。

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of all the roles for the application.
trans-unit.target: 取得應用程式所有角色的清單。

trans-unit.target: 字串陣列，包含儲存在應用程式資料來源中的所有角色名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.GetAllRoles%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider.GetAllRoles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method of the default role provider to get a list of all the roles from the data source for an application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.GetAllRoles%2A>方法呼叫<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider.GetAllRoles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>預設角色提供者，以取得資料來源的所有角色的清單，應用程式的方法。

trans-unit.source: Only the roles for the application that is specified in the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.ApplicationName%2A> property are retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式中所指定的角色<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.ApplicationName%2A>擷取屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.GetAllRoles%2A> method to get the list of roles for an application and bind the results to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView?displayProperty=nameWithType> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.GetAllRoles%2A>方法，以取得應用程式角色的清單，以及繫結至結果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView?displayProperty=nameWithType>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Role management is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: 未啟用角色管理。

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of the roles that a user is in.
trans-unit.target: 取得使用者所屬角色的清單。

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of the roles that the currently logged-on user is in.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前登入的使用者所屬的角色清單。

trans-unit.source: A string array containing the names of all the roles that the currently logged-on user is in.
trans-unit.target: 字串陣列，包含目前登入的使用者所屬的所有角色名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.GetRolesForUser%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method of the default role provider to retrieve from the data source the roles that the currently logged-on user is in.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.GetRolesForUser%2A>方法呼叫<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法的預設角色提供者來擷取資料來源的目前登入使用者所屬的角色。

trans-unit.source: The currently logged-on user is identified by the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext?displayProperty=nameWithType>, or by <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> for non-HTTP hosting environments.
trans-unit.target: 目前登入的使用者由<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性的目前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext?displayProperty=nameWithType>，或由<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>非 HTTP 的裝載環境。

trans-unit.source: If no user is logged on, an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有使用者登入，就會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Only the roles for the application that is specified in the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.ApplicationName%2A> property are retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式中所指定的角色<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.ApplicationName%2A>擷取屬性。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CacheRolesInCookie%2A> is `true`, then the results of the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.GetRolesForUser%2A> method may be returned from the role cache rather than the specified role provider.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CacheRolesInCookie%2A>是`true`，然後結果<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.GetRolesForUser%2A>方法可能會傳回角色快取，而非指定的角色提供者。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.GetRolesForUser%2A> method to retrieve a list of roles for a specified user and bind the returned roles to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView?displayProperty=nameWithType> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.GetRolesForUser%2A>方法來擷取指定的使用者角色的清單，並繫結傳回的角色<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView?displayProperty=nameWithType>控制項。

trans-unit.target: 沒有目前登入的使用者。

trans-unit.source: Role management is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: 未啟用角色管理。

trans-unit.source: The user to return a list of roles for.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回角色清單的使用者。

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of the roles that a user is in.
trans-unit.target: 取得使用者所屬角色的清單。

trans-unit.source: A string array containing the names of all the roles that the specified user is in.
trans-unit.target: 字串陣列，包含指定使用者所屬的所有角色名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.GetRolesForUser%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method of the default role provider to retrieve from the data source the roles that the user is in.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.GetRolesForUser%2A>方法呼叫<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法的預設角色提供者來擷取資料來源的使用者所屬的角色。

trans-unit.source: Only the roles for the application that is specified in the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.ApplicationName%2A> property are retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式中所指定的角色<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.ApplicationName%2A>擷取屬性。

trans-unit.source: If `username` is equal to the current logged-on user and <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CacheRolesInCookie%2A> is `true`, the results of the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.GetRolesForUser%2A> method may be returned from the role cache rather than the specified <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Provider%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`username`是否等於目前的登入的使用者和<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CacheRolesInCookie%2A>是`true`，結果<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.GetRolesForUser%2A>方法可能會傳回角色快取，而非指定<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Provider%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.GetRolesForUser%2A> method to retrieve a list of roles for a specified user and bind the returned roles to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView?displayProperty=nameWithType> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.GetRolesForUser%2A>方法來擷取指定的使用者角色的清單，並繫結傳回的角色<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView?displayProperty=nameWithType>控制項。

trans-unit.source: For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles>.
trans-unit.target: 如需可讓您管理角色的 Web.config 檔案的範例，請參閱<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles>。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="username" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="username" /> 包含逗號 (,)。

trans-unit.source: Role management is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: 未啟用角色管理。

trans-unit.source: The role to get the list of users for.
trans-unit.target: 要取得使用者清單的角色。

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of users in the specified role.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定角色的使用者清單。

trans-unit.source: A string array containing the names of all the users who are members of the specified role.
trans-unit.target: 字串陣列，包含屬於指定角色成員的所有使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.GetUsersInRole%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider.GetUsersInRole%2A> method of the default role provider to retrieve the user names associated with a role from the data source.

trans-unit.source: Only the roles for the application that is specified in the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.ApplicationName%2A> property are retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式中所指定的角色<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.ApplicationName%2A>擷取屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.GetUsersInRole%2A> method to get a list of the users in a particular role and binds the results to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.GetUsersInRole%2A>方法來取得特定角色的使用者清單，並將結果繫結<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles>.
trans-unit.target: 如需可讓您管理角色的 Web.config 檔案的範例，請參閱<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="roleName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="roleName" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="roleName" /> is an empty string or contains a comma (,).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="roleName" /> 是空字串，或包含逗號 (,)。

trans-unit.source: Role management is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: 未啟用角色管理。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a user is in the specified role.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出使用者是否在指定的角色中。

trans-unit.source: The name of the role to search in.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的角色名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the currently logged-on user is in the specified role.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出目前登入的使用者是否在指定的角色中。

trans-unit.source: The API is only intended to be called within the context of an ASP.NET request thread, and in that sanctioned use case it is thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: API 僅適合在 ASP.NET 要求執行緒的內容當中呼叫，且在此種允許的使用案例中可保障執行緒安全。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the currently logged-on user is in the specified role; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前登入的使用者在指定的角色中，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.IsUserInRole%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider.IsUserInRole%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method of the default role provider to determine whether the currently logged-on user is associated with a role from the data source for the application that is specified in the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.ApplicationName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.IsUserInRole%2A>方法呼叫<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider.IsUserInRole%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法來判斷目前登入的使用者是否與資料來源的應用程式中所指定的角色相關聯的預設角色提供者<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.ApplicationName%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The currently logged-on user is identified by the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext?displayProperty=nameWithType>, or by <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> for non-HTTP hosting environments.
trans-unit.target: 目前登入的使用者由<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性的目前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext?displayProperty=nameWithType>，或由<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>非 HTTP 的裝載環境。

trans-unit.source: If no user is logged on, an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有使用者登入，就會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Only the roles for the application that is specified in the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.ApplicationName%2A> property are retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式中所指定的角色<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.ApplicationName%2A>擷取屬性。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CacheRolesInCookie%2A> is `true`, then `roleName` may be checked against the roles cache rather than the specified role provider.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CacheRolesInCookie%2A>是`true`，然後`roleName`可能經過角色快取，而不是指定的角色提供者。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例以程式設計方式檢查目前登入的使用者是否在系統管理員角色中，然後才允許使用者檢視應用程式的角色設定。

trans-unit.target: 未啟用角色管理。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the specified user is in the specified role.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出指定使用者是否在指定的角色中。

trans-unit.source: The API is only intended to be called within the context of an ASP.NET request thread, and in that sanctioned use case it is thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: API 僅適合在 ASP.NET 要求執行緒的內容當中呼叫，且在此種允許的使用案例中可保障執行緒安全。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified user is in the specified role; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的使用者在指定的角色中，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.IsUserInRole%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider.IsUserInRole%2A> method of the default role provider to determine whether a user name is associated with a role from the data source for the application that is specified in the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.ApplicationName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.IsUserInRole%2A>方法呼叫<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider.IsUserInRole%2A>方法來判斷使用者名稱是否與資料來源的應用程式中所指定的角色相關聯的預設角色提供者<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.ApplicationName%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If `username` is equal to the current logged-on user and the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CacheRolesInCookie%2A> property value is `true`, `roleName` may be checked against the role cache rather than the specified <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Provider%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`username`是否等於目前的登入的使用者和<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CacheRolesInCookie%2A>屬性值是`true`，`roleName`可能經過角色快取，而非指定<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Provider%2A>。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例以程式設計方式檢查使用者是否為系統管理員角色允許使用者檢視應用程式的角色設定之前。

trans-unit.source: For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles>.
trans-unit.target: 如需可讓您管理角色的 Web.config 檔案的範例，請參閱<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="roleName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="roleName" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

<paramref name="username" /> is <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="roleName" /> is an empty string or contains a comma (,).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="roleName" /> 是空字串，或包含逗號 (,)。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="username" /> contains a comma (,).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="username" /> 包含逗號 (,)。

trans-unit.source: Role management is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: 未啟用角色管理。

trans-unit.source: Gets the maximum number of role names to be cached for a user.
trans-unit.target: 取得要為使用者快取角色名稱的最大數目。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of role names to be cached for a user.
trans-unit.target: 要為使用者快取角色名稱的最大數目。

trans-unit.source: The default is 25.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 25。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.MaxCachedResults%2A> property is set using the `maxCachedResults` configuration attribute.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.MaxCachedResults%2A>屬性會設定使用`maxCachedResults`組態屬性。

trans-unit.source: The value of the `maxCachedResults` configuration attribute must be set to an integer value greater than zero.
trans-unit.target: 值`maxCachedResults`組態屬性必須設定為整數值小於或等於零。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範中的項目`system.web`的 ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案區段。

trans-unit.source: It specifies that the application uses a <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider> instance and sets the `maxCachedResults` attribute to 10.
trans-unit.target: 它會指定應用程式使用<xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider>執行個體和設定`maxCachedResults`屬性設定為 10。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default role provider for the application.
trans-unit.target: 取得應用程式的預設角色提供者。

trans-unit.source: The default role provider for the application, which is exposed as a class that inherits the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider" /> abstract class.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式的預設角色提供者，公開為繼承 <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider" /> 抽象類別的類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Provider%2A> property enables you to directly reference the default role provider for an application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Provider%2A>屬性可讓您直接參考應用程式的預設角色提供者。

trans-unit.source: This is commonly used to access custom members of the role provider that are not part of the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider> abstract class.
trans-unit.target: 這通常用來存取自訂角色提供者的成員不屬於<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider>抽象類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider> class includes an overload of the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider.IsUserInRole%2A> method that enables you to determine whether a user is in a common Windows role by using a <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider>類別包含的多載<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider.IsUserInRole%2A>方法可讓您判斷使用者是否在一般的 Windows 角色中，使用<xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole>列舉值。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider> class for an application can be obtained by using the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Provider%2A> property and can be cast as a <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider> in order to refer to the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider.IsUserInRole%2A> overload.
trans-unit.target: 參考<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider>類別應用程式可以使用來取得<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Provider%2A>屬性，且可以轉換成<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider>為了參考<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider.IsUserInRole%2A>多載。

trans-unit.source: If multiple role providers are configured for an application, you can access different role providers using the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Providers%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果多個角色提供者設定應用程式，您可以存取不同的角色提供者使用<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Providers%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: The following code example casts the default role provider as a <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider> and checks whether the currently logged-on user is in the Administrators role before allowing the user to view roles settings for the application.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會轉換為預設角色提供者，做為<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider>和檢查目前登入的使用者是否在系統管理員角色中，再允許使用者檢視應用程式的角色設定。

trans-unit.source: For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 如需可讓您管理角色的 Web.config 檔案的範例，請參閱<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider>。

trans-unit.source: Role management is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: 未啟用角色管理。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of the role providers for the ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: 取得 ASP.NET 應用程式的角色提供者集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.RoleProviderCollection" /> that contains the role providers configured for the ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.RoleProviderCollection" />，包含為 ASP.NET 應用程式所設定的角色提供者。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Providers%2A> property references all the role providers enabled for an application, including any providers added in the Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Providers%2A>屬性會參考所有啟用的應用程式的角色提供者，包括任何提供者加入 Web.config 檔案中。

trans-unit.source: You can control which role providers are available for an application by using the `providers` element of the section in the Web.config file for your application.
trans-unit.target: 您可以控制哪些角色提供者可用的應用程式使用`providers`中您的應用程式的 Web.config 檔案區段的項目。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a section that removes any existing providers (such as those specified in the Machine.config file) and adds a <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider> instance as the role provider for the application.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示移除任何現有的提供者 （例如，Machine.config 檔案中指定） 的區段，並加入<xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider>與應用程式的角色提供者執行個體。

trans-unit.source: You can obtain a strongly typed reference to a provider from the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Providers%2A> collection by indexing the role provider by name and casting it as the desired type.
trans-unit.target: 您可以取得的提供者的強型別的參考<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Providers%2A>索引名稱的角色提供者，並將它轉型為所需的型別集合。

trans-unit.source: You can obtain a reference to the default provider for an application using the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Provider%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以取得應用程式使用的預設提供者的參考<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Provider%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example lists the providers enabled for an application and their respective types.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會列出啟用應用程式和其各自的型別提供者。

trans-unit.source: Role management is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: 未啟用角色管理。

trans-unit.target: 從指定角色中移除指定的使用者。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.RemoveUserFromRole%2A> method calls the default role provider to remove the specified user from the specified role at the data source.

<paramref name="username" /> is <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="roleName" /> 是空字串，或包含逗號 (,)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="username" /> is an empty string or contains a comma (,).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="username" /> 是空字串，或包含逗號 (,)。

trans-unit.source: Role management is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: 未啟用角色管理。

trans-unit.source: The user to remove from the specified roles.
trans-unit.target: 從指定角色中移除的使用者。

trans-unit.source: A string array of role names to remove the specified user from.
trans-unit.target: 要移除指定使用者之角色名稱的字串陣列。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified user from the specified roles.
trans-unit.target: 從指定角色中移除指定的使用者。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.RemoveUserFromRoles%2A> method calls the default role provider to remove the specified user from the specified roles at the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.RemoveUserFromRoles%2A>方法會呼叫預設角色提供者，從在資料來源指定的角色中移除指定的使用者。

trans-unit.source: If the application is configured to use the <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider> class, the database updates that are performed during the call to the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.RemoveUserFromRoles%2A> method are made within a transaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果應用程式設定為使用<xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider>類別，會在呼叫期間執行資料庫更新<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.RemoveUserFromRoles%2A>方法在交易內進行。

trans-unit.source: If an error is encountered, such as a user name that is not in a specified role, the transaction is rolled back and no updates are performed.
trans-unit.target: 如果發生錯誤，例如使用者名稱不在指定的角色，會回復交易，會執行任何更新。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.RemoveUserFromRoles%2A> method to remove a user from one or more roles.

trans-unit.source: If the application uses the <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider> class, the database updates that are performed during the call to the <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider.RemoveUsersFromRoles%2A> method are made within a transaction.
